text:
@realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse You saying "many people said so" doesn't give you credibility. I stay with new agencies that check their facts, not just "hunches".

"Well, I think the 3.4 percent is really a false number...is just my hunch"

The global mortality rate is currently 4.63%
https://t.co/A1X4g1wOzm
